content: Yesterday, without meaning to, I did not go back to work after having lunch with my brother. When the day ended (and this is after a long string of workworkwork/eat/sleep/work/workwhileeating/dreamofworking), I felt reborn — once I kicked out of my mind like a football the “old brain” screaming, “WHAT DID YOU DO TODAY? ARE YOU CRAZY?” Thanks for this…right on time!
